specification.title: Product Feed Flickering Issue Diagnosis and Prevention

issue_identification.root_cause: Products repeatedly removed and re-added to Merchant Center feed
issue_identification.google_behavior: Algorithm treats flickering products as 'new inventory' with auction priority
issue_identification.typical_cause: Stock synchronization issues between e-commerce platform and GMC

monitoring_approach.track_product_status: Monitor individual product IDs for feed status changes
monitoring_approach.frequency_alerts: Flag products removed/re-added multiple times per day
monitoring_approach.enhanced_tracking: Implement immediate alerts for feed flickering patterns

investigation_metrics.click_distribution: Analyze click concentration by product ID during anomalies
investigation_metrics.feed_history: Review Merchant Center feed upload history
investigation_metrics.stock_synchronization: Verify inventory system integration with GMC
